title: Part b. [0–3]
stimulusHtml:
3 points (i. 1 point; ii. 2 points)

i. 1 point: For correctly indicating direction, such as by an upward directed arrow at point P2,

ii. 2 points

1 point: For correctly checking the space in front of "Less"

1 point: For correct justification, such as "P2 is farther from all the charges than P1 , so the net field is less." If student chose to work out the actual magnitude of the field at P2 (which is about 45,000 N/C), the justification point was awarded for any calculated numerical value less than 75,000 N/C.

Note: No points were awarded for b. ii. if the wrong space was checked.
